title: IIT Kanpur Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Project Research Scientist Post
description: Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Kanpur has announced the official Notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for the Project Research Scientist Jobs. Those candidates who are qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering, Post Graduation can apply for the IIT Kanpur Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the Age Limit, Selection Process, Education details, Salary Structure, Application fee, and how to apply for these Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online t...
